description: I. Letter [undated] from Alan Campbell to Public Bill Committee members regarding the Policing and Crime Bill in particular provisions relating to prostitution. 11 p. II. Letter dated 14/05/2009 from Vernon Coaker MP to David Ruffley MP and Chris Huhne MP regarding Government amendments to the Policing and Crime Bill. 9 p. III. Draft statutory instrument: The Police and Criminal Evidence Act 1984 (Retention of Samples etc.) Regulations 2009. 5 p.
